tutorial: How to set up a new Chart
type: Adding Charts - Hooking up a Chart to Data Products

definition.text: We are almost to the node we need!

paragraphs.text: We've been working on adding some Data Mine Products to our chart. Let's be a little more specific, we are going to add the data mine products for the Masters Data Mine in the Binance BTC/USDT market. As you follow the hierarchy down you should see the Market Data Products nodes for the Binance BTC/USDT market.
There are three data mines installed in this Workspace. You will see one Market Data Products node for each market.
